subject: RE: [junit] How to test protected and private methods/ fields?
msgSnippet: While everyone s out to lunch I can submit this FieldAccessor class I forgot to attach.  Doh! Scott S. ... From: Scott Stirling To: Jens Andersen ;
messageBody:

to attach. Doh!

Scott S.

Subject: RE: [junit] How to test protected and private methods/ fields?

{snip]
I'm attaching the FieldAccessor, which is mainly from Larman and
Guthrie's Java 2 performance and idiom book. Personally, I have yet
to need this class for anything, but I thought I'd pass it along.
It's javadoc'ed.
[snip]
